sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-switch label="Toggle between light and dark theme."></v-switch>
    </v-card-text>
    <v-btn @click="getTheme">toggle</v-btn>
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";

export default {
  name: "SettingsView",
  data() {
    return {
      theme: useTheme,
      darkMode: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getTheme() {
      const themeMode = localStorage.getItem("theme");
      console.log(themeMode);
    },
  },
  computed: {},
  mounted() {
    localStorage.setItem("theme", false);
  },
};
</script>
